prompts: Create a shiny Pokemon that resembles a star with a vibrant orange hue and celestial patterns.
Imagine a playful Pokemon that sparkles in the sunlight, featuring bright colors and a cheerful demeanor.
Design a unique Pokemon that embodies the essence of a shooting star, with a bright orange body and glowing accents.
Show me a whimsical Pokemon that floats gently through the air, adorned with star-like shapes and a sunny color palette.
Generate a Pokemon that captures the beauty of a sunset, showcasing a warm orange shade and distinctive star motifs.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a cosmic entity, glowing with orange light and surrounded by twinkling stars.
Make a Pokemon that reflects joy and brightness, with a round body and playful features in shades of orange.
